channel.title: [DELTA]Equipment Help
channel.description: 1. How do i make it so that a certain item equips into a certain slot. For example, pink phat equips into head slot and not wep slot 2. How do i make a weapon 2h?

item.title: [DELTA]Equipment Help
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

  1. In Item.java, there is a bunch of different arrays that can be used to determine various item properties, including which slot equipment is assigned to.
    For example, if you wanted to make an Amulet of Fury (ID: 6585) go to the amulet slot, you would add itâ€™s ID to the amulets array.
  1. In client.java, inside the wear method, there is an array called two_hand. Simply add the item IDs of the weapons you wish to act as two-handed weapons here.

Read full topic
